title: May champion and skin sale schedule

replies.body: Finally a schedule! Thank you! No more of those "Wow Riot, I just bought that skin yesterday" complainers
Here come the trolls: "God damnit Rito, just bought all these yesterday"
"God damnit Rito, just bought all these yesterday"
Rito is rich
Rito Suav'e ;){{item:3301}}
I bought like 5 of these skins years ago. Does that count?
talk to the {{champion:12}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:412}}'s but they might tell you no

I'm pretty sure {{champion:37}} would just float there and stare at you
God damn it Rito
Co-sign.
Tan-gent

Sine...
yeah doesnt really work with only one syllable.  Al the good ones were taken

so rito's the one whose been taking my sandwich{{champion:64}} (buys wards)

Just RP
Udyr knows all... Answering a minute before the question was even asked!
Its magic
Suffering is magic {{champion:120}}
I don't want to be that person but if it was a minute before it would be 1 minute more than the comment above...
Shame on you, you logic-using individual.  I thought it was already well known that a large percentage of the population is opposed to such matters.

Schedules are awesome!  Nobody likes to be blindsided, so this is definitely an improvement.  I'll be saving my pennies.

Awesome! I've been hoping for something like this for awhile.

Possibly because Riot is planning on reworking Yorick. They announced plans for it a long time ago. Anyways, they don't want to encourage people to start playing a champion now that will get changed sometime. Hopefully, same for Urgot.
